1. City Council

City Council
============

* Anna Municipal Complex-Council Chambers

Persons with disabilities who want to attend a meeting and may need assistance should contact the City Secretary at 972-924-3325 two business days before the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.

Agendas are available three business days prior to the meetings.
Agendas and Business Packet

Mayor,
[Pete Cain](https://www.annatexas.gov/1354/Pete-Cain)
, Term 2024-2027
Place 1,
[Kevin Toten](https://www.annatexas.gov/1072/Kevin-Toten)
, Term 2024-2027 Mayor Pro Tem
Place 2,
[Nathan Bryan](https://www.annatexas.gov/1612/Nathan-Bryan)
, Term 2025-2028
Place 3,
[Stan Carver II](https://www.annatexas.gov/1074/Stan-Carver-II)
, Term 2023-2026 Deputy Mayor Pro Tem
Place 4,
[Kelly Patterson-Herndon](https://www.annatexas.gov/1562/Kelly-Patterson-Herndon)
, Term 2025-2028
Place 5,
[Elden Baker](https://www.annatexas.gov/1426/Elden-Baker)
, Term 2023-2026
Place 6,
[Manny Singh](https://www.annatexas.gov/1607/Manny-Singh)
, Term 2025-2028

The Anna City Council is comprised of a Mayor and six at-large
who are elected for three-year terms to represent the citizens of the City of Anna.

The City Charter of Anna provides for a Council-Manager form of local government. The Mayor and
function as the policy-making body of the Cityâ€™s government, determining the overall goals, objectives, and direction for city services, and adopting the annual operating budgets for all City Departments.
